ECClass.description: List Class for Annotation Bubbles and Instruments

Assembly of collinear Inline components that make up a complex inline component or system. The components can be treated as single object or as individual objects based on insertion settings. The Schematics Inline Assembly is the base assembly type for all Schematics Inline assembly types.
